pool

Class ResourcePool<R extends Resource>

  • java.lang.Object
    • pool.ResourcePool<R>
  • Type Parameters:
    R - The type of the object extends of resource to use
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasketPool, CubiclePool

    public abstract class ResourcePool<R extends Resource>
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manage a pool of resource of type R
    Author:
    dubois hembert
